definition: team building (abbr. for 團隊建設|团队建设[tuan2 dui4 jian4 she4])/building camaraderie within the Chinese Communist Youth League 中國共產主義青年團|中国共产主义青年团[Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2]
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: League construction is one of the focal points of college political ideology education.
sentences.chinese: 团建工作是高校思想政治工作的重点之一。

definition: (loanword) party (social gathering)/(Tw) party (typically associated with sex and drugs)
communal meal/formal dinner of club or group
to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
afternoon tea (light afternoon meal, typically pastries with tea or coffee)
to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
